概述  软件包   类  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

tv.matchstick.flint
接口 FlintManager.ConnectionCallbacks

正在封闭接口：
FlintManager
public static interface FlintManager.ConnectionCallbacks

Connection callback. Provides callbacks that are called when the client is connected or disconnected from the service.

Most applications implement onConnected(Bundle) to start making requests.

字段摘要
static int CAUSE_CONNECTION_CANCEL
          Connection cancel
static int CAUSE_CONNECTION_FAILED
          Connection failed
static int CAUSE_NETWORK_LOST
          Network lost.
static int CAUSE_SERVICE_DISCONNECTED
          Service disconnected.
 
方法摘要
 void onConnected(Bundle connectionHint)
          Called when connected.
 void onConnectionFailed(ConnectionResult result)
          Called when there was an error connecting the client to the service.
 void onConnectionSuspended(int cause)
          Called when suspended.
 

字段详细信息

CAUSE_CONNECTION_CANCEL

static final int CAUSE_CONNECTION_CANCEL
Connection cancel

另请参见：
常量字段值

CAUSE_SERVICE_DISCONNECTED

static final int CAUSE_SERVICE_DISCONNECTED
Service disconnected. A suspension cause informing that the service has been killed.

另请参见：
常量字段值

CAUSE_NETWORK_LOST

static final int CAUSE_NETWORK_LOST
Network lost. A suspension cause informing you that a peer device connection was lost.

另请参见：
常量字段值

CAUSE_CONNECTION_FAILED

static final int CAUSE_CONNECTION_FAILED
Connection failed

另请参见：
常量字段值
方法详细信息

onConnected

void onConnected(Bundle connectionHint)
Called when connected. After calling connect(), this method will be invoked asynchronously when the connect request has successfully completed.

参数：
connectionHint -

onConnectionSuspended

void onConnectionSuspended(int cause)
Called when suspended. Called when the client is temporarily in a disconnected state.

参数：
cause -

onConnectionFailed

void onConnectionFailed(ConnectionResult result)
Called when there was an error connecting the client to the service.

参数：
result -
